dmca.title: [ABUSE] RE: ROLEX WATCH U.S.A., INC.
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, February 17, 2005 5:15 PM
To: gafcounsel@gibney.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] RE: ROLEX WATCH U.S.A., INC.

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1



Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Gaf Counsel <gafcounsel@gibney.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com, copyright@theplanet.com, admins@theplanet.com
Date: Thursday, February 17, 2005, 4:14:58 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] RE:  ROLEX WATCH U.S.A., INC.

===8<==============Original message text===============









                                        February 17, 2005




BY EMAIL: abuse@theplanet.com; copyright@theplanet.com; admins@theplanet.com
AND FIRST CLASS MAIL
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207


RE:  ROLEX WATCH U.S.A., INC.

To ThePlanet.com Internet Services,Inc.:

This firm is general counsel to Rolex Watch U.S.A., Inc. ("Rolex"), the
owners of the federally registered Rolex Trademarks: ROLEX, PRESIDENT,
SUBMARINER, YACHT-MASTER, DAYTONA, GMT-MASTER, DATEJUST and Crown Device
(among others).

We are writing to request your assistance with a website hosted by your
service that is selling counterfeit Rolex products.

The www.anyreplicawatch.com website offers counterfeit and infringing Rolex
watches for sale.  Such illegal use of the Rolex Trademarks is likely to
cause confusion and constitutes counterfeiting, trademark infringement and
dilution of Rolex's intellectual property rights in violation of both
federal and state laws.

Pursuant to ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.'s policies and the
requirements of The Digital Millennium Copyright Act ("DMCA"), please note
the following:

1.        Signature of the undersigned set forth below.


2.        www.anyreplicawatch.com is offering for sale counterfeit Rolex
merchandise and the offer for sale and the sale of counterfeit merchandise
is prohibited by federal law (15 U.S.C.
